activities:
You or Your Agent may provide us with your personal information, which could include your name, street address, telephone number, email address, answer to security questions, information about your company or business, social security number,
driver’s license number, date of birth, credit card and/or other payment/ordering information, photographic image,
Individual Taxpayer Identification Numbers, non-U.S. tax ID or social insurance numbers, and any other information we
collect about you that by itself is not personal information but if combined with personal information could be used to
personally identify you. You, or Your Agent, may provide us with your personal information when entering information into
the GTN Portal SaaS application (the “Portal”); sending source documents to us via the Document Sharing feature in the
Portal; making a payment to GTN; contacting us via our Website; subscribing to our email notifications and/or newsletters;
registering and/or setting up an account/profile to access, visit and/or use our Portal; and engaging in any other transaction
with us on, or in relation to, our Services. GTN will use personal information to respond to your inquiries, and/or other
requests or questions, enable your or Your Agent’s use of the Services, contact you regarding your engagement with us,
collect payments, respond to your application for employment, and to send you or Your Agent invoices, email notifications
which you have specifically requested, limited email marketing communications relating to our business, and email messages
containing company news, product, or Service information
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, offline and manually processed data
